snippet.title: Pairs & Perils - Memory-Game Roguelike - Official Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Pairs & Perils is a memory-game roguelike and dungeon crawler. Match cards to attack enemies, avoid traps, shop for relics and consumables. Sharpen your mind as you journey through the depths of the dungeon in search of The Dealer.

Wishlist and get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3179860/Pairs__Perils/
